Address.label: Address
Address.value: ONE VALERO WAY, SAN ANTONIO, Texas, 78249, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Valero Energy is one of the largest independent refiners in the United States. It operates 14 refineries with a total throughput capacity of 3.2 million barrels a day in the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom. Valero also owns 14 ethanol plants with capacity of 1.7 billion gallons of ethanol a year and holds a 50% stake in Diamond Green Diesel, which has capacity to produce 700 million gallons per year of renewable diesel.

value.name: Gary K. Simmons
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
